snippet: It is important for the technology industry to create technical standards and for companies to cross-license patents to each other.
abstract: Editorial praises Obama administration for vetoing decision by United States International Trade Commission to ban import of certain older-model Apple iPhones and iPads that it determined had violated patents owned by Samsung Electronics; contends veto sends strong message that routine dispute over standards-essential patents should not be basis of an import ban.
lead_paragraph: It is important for the technology industry to create technical standards and for companies to cross-license patents to each other.

headline.main: A Veto of an Import Ban
headline.print_headline: A Veto of an Import Ban
